A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m a Star Wars fan\, but by no means a super fan. I enjoyed the film\, and effects were great but I’d say as a fan of the story I was left disappointed. They definitely didn’t deliver what true fans wanted when it comes to Luke\, leia and rey (her back story) and even phasma\, I was also both shocked and disappointed with the story of snoke. Watch it and you’ll see what I mean! On the positive side there were some great surprises that I really enjoyed. Roll on starwars episode 9. Hopefully jj can give the true fans more of what they crave.
